title: 325. Q&AF: Game Of Entrepreneurship, Innovation In Inherited Business & Life Guru Advice
itunes:title: 325. Q&AF: Game Of Entrepreneurship, Innovation In Inherited Business & Life Guru Advice
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on his favorite aspects of being an entrepreneur, the best way to add innovation into an inherited family business, and advice from life gurus that you should avoid at all costs.
